generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, adjacent to the building, and also along the right side, separated by a curb.
- building: A modern multi-story building with large windows and a gray facade is prominently featured on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and bushes visible along the right side of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil areas are visible along the right sidewalk and in the background, indicating terrain.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- bus: A white and red bus with the text "KOCHS" is visible in the distance, driving away from the camera.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including one near the bus and others along the sidewalk on the right.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, near the building.
- fence: A fence made of vertical posts is visible along the right side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the vegetation.
